api_list.name: Ai Quote
api_list.description: Random quote will be return if id = 0
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-quotes45.p.rapidapi.com/0"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-quotes45.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ai-quotes45.p.rapidapi.com/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ai-quotes45.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
